comment: Prof. Habers is probably one of the best professors I've had. She honestly cares about her students and pushes you to your best! Open to creativity and is very understanding of circumstances. You WILL have to keep up with assignments as oil ink takes forever to dry so I highly recommend staying after class and carve ASAP to print on time!

I did her for the maymester. Easy class. No lockdown tests!
I think we did discussion posts? If so, it was pretty easy. 

10/10 class.

I did the Maymester course and it was very easy. We got to choose 4 discussions out of 10. The 3 tests were all multiple choice and were very easy to follow with the readings. The textbook clearly stated the answers and the discussions were easy. Just make sure that you read and follow the prompts. I've recommended it to several people already.

This class is a maymester. There were three test and 4 discussion post and a museum visit virtually or in person. She is very helpful but can be a tough grader when grading discussion. She likes posts to be fact heavy. It's not hard at all. Test are veryyyy easy. Easy class for credit. Last two weeks. Definitely recommend taking.

Nice teacher... all the tests and quizzes you could use socratic to help.. easy class I suppose but she treats it like its a writing classic understand how format is important but takes way too many points off just because you don't punctuate something.

She never posted a writing assignment on time. Always a few days of a week late. there were 3 tests including the final. and i think 3 or 4 graded quizzes. as for the grading on the writing assignments she didn't grade until the week after the last day of school. so you never truly know your grade. my love for art was sorta killed by this class.

Tests and quizzes are could be hard due to the fact that she asks for specific details. Fortunately, she drops lowest test grade. Sometimes gives busy work which half of us tend to forget to do. Write all the upcoming due dates down! Overall, very good at teaching us about Kennesaw and other ways to be successful.

Prof. Lovelace really makes sure you are comfortable with college when you first enter. She is VERY organized and very easy to talk to. She will teach you A LOT more on a global scale, too. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

Can't really seem to know what she wants.  Expects too much out of a drawing class.  Was gender biased to the guys in the class and gave them better grades. Stricter on the girls and I even had a doctor's excuse for my absences but wouldn't change my grade
Professor Lovelace was so helpful to me in my first semester of school! I am so happy to have had her.
